law.history: Repealed 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 168, sec. 159, effective December 31, 2007. -- Amended 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 150, sec. 1, effective June 24, 2003. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 35, sec. 10, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 113, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 30, sec. 9, effective July 15, 1986; and ch. 431, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 131, sec. 9, effective July 15, 1982.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Tax advantages, credits, and exemptions for qualified businesses.
metadata.lrc-note: (3/18/2005). 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 168, sec. 159, has repealed this statute effective December 31, 2007.
